mapper.select: SELECT distinct ar.role_id AS roleId, ar.role_name AS roleName, ar.remark AS remark, organization_id AS organizationId, data_permissions AS dataPermissions, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_ucenter_ms_role ar WHERE ar.role_name = #{roleName}

SELECT distinct ar.role_id AS roleId, ar.role_name AS roleName, ar.remark AS remark, organization_id AS organizationId, data_permissions AS dataPermissions, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_ucenter_ms_role ar INNER JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela arur ON ar.role_id=arur.role_id WHERE arur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT role_id AS roleId, role_name AS roleName, remark AS remark, is_enable AS isEnable, organization_id AS organizationId, data_permissions AS dataPermissions, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_ucenter_ms_role
AND is_delete = 0
AND organization_id LIKE CONCAT(#{organizationId}, '%')
AND is_enable = 1
ORDER BY role_id
LIMIT ${start} OFFSET ${end}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS count FROM t_ucenter_ms_role
AND is_delete = 0
AND organization_id LIKE CONCAT(#{organizationId}, '%')

SELECT role_name AS roleName, role_id AS roleId, remark AS remark, ( CASE is_enable WHEN '0' THEN '启用' WHEN '1' THEN '禁用' END ) AS state, organization_id AS organizationId, data_permissions AS dataPermissions, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_ucenter_ms_role
LIMIT ${start} OFFSET ${end}

SELECT CAST(boxId AS CHAR) AS boxId FROM( SELECT CASE WHEN b.permission_type = 5 THEN CONCAT('el_',b.permission_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 1 THEN CONCAT('r_',b.menu_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 2 THEN CONCAT("w_",b.menu_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 3 THEN CONCAT("e_",b.menu_id) WHEN b.permission_type = 4 THEN CONCAT("d_",b.menu_id) END AS boxId FROM t_sett_ms_menu_permission b LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_permission ro ON ro.permission_id = b.permission_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role r ON r.role_id = ro.role_id WHERE r.role_id = #{roleId}) t
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ucenter_ms_role_user_rela WHERE role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT CONCAT( "p_", b.permission_id) FROM t_sett_ms_menu_permission b LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role_permission ro ON ro.permission_id = b.permission_id LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_role r ON r.role_id = ro.role_id WHERE r.role_id = #{roleId}
